title: Ep. - 555 - THE SURREAL LIFE CREATORS GIRARDI CASE UPDATE
description:
Jay Edelson from Edelson PC gives the latest update to the federal lawsuit filed against Tom and Erika Girardi.

 

Tahira Francis, co-executive producer of The Surreal Life on VH1, discusses the re-launch of the reality tv show with a new all-star cast. Kate also includes clips from her previous interview with Mark Cronin, who created the original show in 2003. (It is one of her favorite episodes.)

 

 

Reality Life with Kate Casey
